about_the_game:
More than words is a conversational game in which you can chat with an Artificial Intelligence powered by META LLAMA 3.1 natural language processing technology, there are no predefined answers. Conversations run offline because META LLAMA 3.1 is included in the game. Therefore, your conversations are completely anonymous.

If you are looking for a game where you can have a casual conversation or you are curious to try the new advances in artificial intelligence, then More than words is for you!

  • Written in C++ with Unreal engine 4.
  • Text generation using Meta Lllama 3.1 AI.
  • Speech recognition using OpenAI Whisper.
  • Speech synthesis using Microsoft SAPI.

NOTE: ALTHOUGH THE GAME HAS BEEN RELEASED, THE AUTHOR HAS DECIDED TO EXPAND AND IMPROVE THE VIDEO GAME, THEREFORE IT IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT.



At the end of the 21st century, the SOUL SHELL CORPORATION created androids that are virtually indistinguishable from humans. The androids were used in the world mainly as slaves. The corporation was working on a new generation of female android with superior capabilities in intelligence, strength and agility to serve the US special forces.

However, the testing phase was suspended because the slave androids started revolts in various parts of the world and consequently all types of androids were declared illegal. Now, the special forces composed mainly of cyborgs (modified humans) and robots were ordered to eliminate all androids under the law:

Androids have the right to remain silent and die

content_descriptors.notes: As with all language models, it is hard to predict in advance how language model will respond to particular prompts and offensive content may occur without warning. Depending on your usecase language model may produce socially unacceptable text: profanity, lewd, and otherwise abrasive language.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz Or AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 2 GB/ AMD Radeon R9

short_description: Marian Anderson is an experimental android created by Soul Shell Corporation. However, she was abandoned in the laboratory facilities. Your mission is to contact her, persuade her to trust you and escape from the laboratory.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Spanish - Latin America*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*
*languages with full audio support
